invek,109,210,5	script	Mhiller	4_M_KNIGHT_SILVER,{

.@merch$ =  "^FF0000[Mhiller]^000000";

mes .@merch$;
mes "Hola, ayuda a mi pueblo a reconstruir Prontera.";
mes "Tengo el siguiente armamento en  venta.";
switch(select("Armas:Armadura")) {

	case 1:

		switch(select("Katars:Mace:Knuckle:Whips:Instruments:Books:Guns:Fuuma:One-Handed Swords:Two-Handed Swords:Spears:Dagger:Axes:Bows:Staffs")) {
			
		close2;
		case 1: callshop "Katars", 1; end;
		case 2: callshop "Macez", 1; end;
		case 3: callshop "Knucklez", 1; end;
		case 4: callshop "Whips", 1; end;
		case 5: callshop "Instruments", 1; end;
		case 6: callshop "Books", 1; end;
		case 7: callshop "Guns", 1; end;
		case 8: callshop "Fuuma", 1; end;
		case 9: callshop "OneSwords", 1; end;
		case 10: callshop "TwoSwords", 1; end;
		case 11: callshop "Spears", 1; end;
		case 12: callshop "Daggerz", 1; end;
		case 13: callshop "Axes", 1; end;
		case 14: callshop "Bows", 1; end;
		case 15: callshop "Staffs", 1; end;
		}


	case 2:

	switch(select("Armor:Shield:Footgear:Garments:Accessories")) {


		case 1: callshop "Armorz", 1; end;
		case 2: callshop "Shieldz", 1; end;
		case 3: callshop "Footgearz", 1; end;
		case 4: callshop "Garments", 1; end;
		case 5: callshop "Accessories", 1; end;

		}

				}
						}





//shops

// Armas
-	shop	Armorz	-1,2304:10000,2306:20000,2308:20000,2310:50000,2311:50000,2313:50000,2315:75000,2317:100000,2322:20000,2326:60000,2331:75000

/*
invek,161,160,3	script	Identificador	4_M_JP_BERKUT,{
set .@Price, 3000;	// Zeny per identify
getinventorylist;
for(set .@i,0; .@i<@inventorylist_count; set .@i,.@i+1) {
	if (@inventorylist_identify[.@i]) continue;
	if (Zeny < .@Price) {
		dispbottom " "+.@Price+" zeny es el precio por identificar artículos."; break; }
	set Zeny, Zeny-.@Price;
	delitem2 @inventorylist_id[.@i],1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0;
	getitem @inventorylist_id[.@i],1;
	setarray .@Total[0], .@Total[0]+1, .@Total[1]+.@Price; }
if (!.@Total[0]) {
	message strcharinfo(0),"No se han identificado artículos."; end; }
specialeffect2 154;
message strcharinfo(0),"Se han identificado "+.@Total[0]+" items"+((.@Total[1])?" por "+.@Total[1]+" Zeny":"")+".";
end;
}
